svg.script: function go() { // Check that dynamic times are reset during a forwards seek var svg = document.documentElement; var a = document.getElementById('a'); svg.pauseAnimations(); svg.setCurrentTime(1); // First interval 1s-2s a.beginElement(); svg.setCurrentTime(2); a.beginElementAt(1); // Add instance time t=3s a.beginElementAt(3); // Add instance time t=5s -- should be cleared during // the seek when we process the restart at t=3s svg.setCurrentTime(5); // Hence at t=5s we should be inactive svg.removeAttribute("class"); }
